comment.author: 77975599@N03
comment._content: This had to be a real fast plate emulsion to freeze the divers without any action, for the high f-stop.  I don't see any Sun shadows.  The subject density seems exceptional, unless there was some dodging and burning in development.  I wonder how many different shots were taken before he chose to work this one.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: wystan: Thanks for catching the date written on the negative. We will add it to the record.
